::Shadow Wing::

A bright smile appeared on her face."Really? Oh that's great."

She whispered to Stegotron. "I have a good friend who's optics were 
baddly damaged in a fight.  Currently he is blind and can't see. Do 
you think you can help him?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, TrikeJacob@n... wrote:
> Stegotron steps toward Triceradon and Shadow Wing. 
> Stegotron: I know how to repair damaged optics sir.
>
